Quick search

setinit¶

This module contains functionality for defining the default directory paths.

Reference¶

apercal.subs.setinit.setdatasetnamestomiriad(self)[source]¶

Renames the dataset names to .mir from .MS for crosscal and following modules

apercal.subs.setinit.setinitdirs(self)[source]¶

Creates the directory names for the subdirectories to make scripting easier
